mapper.insert: insert into LAQUALIFICATION (STAFFID, QUALIFITYPE, EFFECTIVEDATE, STATUS, MAKEDATE, MAKETIME, MODIFYDATE, MODIFYTIME) values (#{staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualifitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectivedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{maketime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select emplid from lduser where emplid=#{emplid}
select emplid from lduser where emplid=#{emplid}

select * from laqualiinfo i where i.qualifitype in (select l.qualifitype from laprodquali l where riskcode =#{riskcode}) and i.certificatecode in (select i.certificatecode from laqualiinfo i where i.certificatecode in (select a.* from ((select a.certificatecode from laqualiinfo a where a.certificatecode in (select l.licensescode from laqualidetails l where l.staffid = #{staffid})) union (select a.certificatecode from laqualiinfo a where a.certificatecode in (select l.licensescode from externalgifts l where l.staffid = #{staffid})) union (select a.certificatecode from laqualiinfo a where a.certificatecode in (select t.coursecode from latraining t where t.staffid=#{staffid}) )) a))

select l.qualifitype from laprodquali l where riskcode =#{riskcode} and l.qualifitype not in(select distinct(qualifitype) from laqualiinfo i where i.qualifitype in (select l.qualifitype from laprodquali l where riskcode =#{riskcode}))

select distinct(i.qualifitype) from laqualiinfo i where i.qualifitype in (select l.qualifitype from laprodquali l where riskcode = #{riskcode}) and i.certificatecode not in (select i.certificatecode from laqualiinfo i where i.certificatecode in (select a.* from ((select a.certificatecode from laqualiinfo a where a.certificatecode in (select l.licensescode from laqualidetails l where l.staffid =#{staffid})) union (select a.certificatecode from laqualiinfo a where a.certificatecode in (select l.licensescode from externalgifts l where l.staffid =#{staffid})) union (select a.certificatecode from laqualiinfo a where a.certificatecode in (select t.coursecode from latraining t where t.staffid=#{staffid}) )) a))
select * from LAPRODQUALI where riskcode =#{riskcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qualifitype not in (select distinct(qualifitype) from laqualification where staffid=#{qualifitype})
mapper.insert:
insert into LAQUALIFICATION
STAFFID,
QUALIFITYPE,
EFFECTIVEDATE,
STATUS,
MAKEDATE,
MAKETIME,
MODIFYDATE,
MODIFYTIME,
#{staffid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qualifitype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{effectivedate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{makedate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{maketime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifydate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
